title.raw: 《孝景本紀》 Annals of the Xiaojing Emperor

sentences.zh: 孝景皇帝者，孝文之中子也。

translations.literal: Emperor Jing was the middle son of Emperor Wen.
translations.idiomatic: Emperor Jing was the middle son of Emperor Wen.

translations.literal: His mother was Empress Dou.
translations.idiomatic: His mother was Empress Dou.

sentences.zh: 孝文在代時，前后有三男，及竇太后得幸，前后死，及三子更死，故孝景得立。

translations.literal: When Emperor Wen was in Dai, the empress previously had three sons, and after Empress Dou was favored, the previous empress died, and the three sons also died, therefore Emperor Jing was able to be established.
translations.idiomatic: When Emperor Wen was in Dai, his previous empress had borne him three sons. After Empress Dou came into favor, the previous empress died, and the three sons also died. Therefore, Emperor Jing was able to ascend the throne.

translations.literal: Emperor Jing was the middle son of Emperor Wen. His mother was Empress Dou. When Emperor Wen was in Dai, the empress previously had three sons, and after Empress Dou was favored, the previous empress died, and the three sons also died, therefore Emperor Jing was able to be established.
In the first year, fourth month, on the day Bingmao, pardon the world.
translations.idiomatic: In the first year, fourth month, on the day Bingmao, he pardoned the empire.

translations.literal: On the day Bisi, grant the people nobility one level.
translations.idiomatic: On the day Bisi, he granted the people nobility one level.

sentences.zh: 五月，除田半租，為孝文立太宗廟。

translations.literal: Fifth month, abolish half the land rent, establish the Taizong Temple for Emperor Wen.
translations.idiomatic: In the fifth month, he abolished half the land tax and established the Supreme Ancestor Temple for Emperor Wen.

translations.literal: Order the assembled ministers not to offer court congratulations.
translations.idiomatic: He ordered the assembled ministers not to offer court congratulations.

translations.literal: The Xiongnu entered Dai, made peace treaty with them.
translations.idiomatic: The Xiongnu invaded Dai and agreed to a peace and kinship alliance.

translations.literal: In the first year, fourth month, on the day Bingmao, pardon the world. On the day Bisi, grant the people nobility one level. Fifth month, abolish half the land rent, establish the Taizong Temple for Emperor Wen. Order the assembled ministers not to offer court congratulations. The Xiongnu entered Dai, made peace treaty with them.

sentences.zh: 二年春，封故相國蕭何孫系為武陵侯。

translations.literal: Second year spring, enfeoff former Chancellor Xiao He's grandson Xi as Marquis of Wuling.
translations.idiomatic: In the second year, spring, he enfeoffed the former Chancellor Xiao He's grandson Xi as Marquis of Wuling.

translations.literal: Men at twenty receive registration.
translations.idiomatic: Men at twenty received their registration for service.

translations.literal: Fourth month on the day Renwu, Empress Wen died.
translations.idiomatic: In the fourth month, on the day Renwu, Empress Wen passed away.

translations.literal: Guangchuan and Changsha kings all went to their fiefs.
translations.idiomatic: The kings of Guangchuan and Changsha both went to their fiefs.

translations.literal: Chancellor Shen Tu Jia died.
translations.idiomatic: Chancellor Shen Tu Jia passed away.

sentences.zh: 八月，以御史大夫開封陶青為丞相。

translations.literal: Eighth month, appointed Imperial Secretary Kaifeng Tao Qing as chancellor.
translations.idiomatic: Third year, winter, tenth month, the edict said: "Recently several years the harvests have repeatedly failed, the people are many distressed and exhausted. I am very worried about it."

translations.literal: Comet appeared in the northeast.
translations.idiomatic: A comet appeared in the northeast.

sentences.zh: 秋，衡山雨雹，大者五寸，深者二尺。

translations.literal: Autumn, in Hengshan hail fell, large ones five inches, deep ones two feet.
translations.idiomatic: "The previous year's edict reduced taxes, now again reduced them. He commanded the feudal lords not to present tribute, reduced the light common people's rents and taxes, relaxed the prohibitions on mountains and marshes, did not command them to take people, made them enter at the proper time, and moreover did not issue any orders that hindered or seized people's strength, to facilitate agricultural matters and enrich its foundation. He completely made these commands."

translations.literal: Mars moved retrograde, guarded Beichen.
translations.idiomatic: Mars moved retrograde and guarded the Northern Culmen.

translations.literal: Moon appeared between Beichen.
translations.idiomatic: The moon appeared between the Northern Culmen.

translations.literal: Jupiter moved retrograde in the Heavenly Court.
translations.idiomatic: Jupiter moved retrograde in the Heavenly Court.

sentences.zh: 置南陵及內史、祋祤為縣。

translations.literal: Established Nanling and within the Interior commandery, Sheyu as counties.
translations.idiomatic: He established Nanling and the Interior Commandant and Feng Yi as counties.

translations.literal: Second year spring, enfeoff former Chancellor Xiao He's grandson Xi as Marquis of Wuling. Men at twenty receive registration. Fourth month on the day Renwu, Empress Wen died. Guangchuan and Changsha kings all went to their fiefs. Chancellor Shen Tu Jia died. Eighth month, appointed Imperial Secretary Kaifeng Tao Qing as chancellor. Comet appeared in the northeast. Autumn, in Hengshan hail fell, large ones five inches, deep ones two feet. Mars moved retrograde, guarded Beichen. Moon appeared between Beichen. Jupiter moved retrograde in the Heavenly Court. Established Nanling and within the Interior commandery, Sheyu as counties.
Third year first month on the day Bingji, pardon the world.
translations.idiomatic: Third year, first month, on the day Yisi, he pardoned the empire.

translations.literal: Long star appeared in the west.
translations.idiomatic: A comet appeared in the west.

sentences.zh: 天火燔雒陽東宮大殿城室。

translations.literal: Heavenly fire burned Luoyang's eastern palace great hall and city rooms.
translations.idiomatic: Heaven's fire burned Luoyang's eastern palace great hall and city chambers.

sentences.zh: 吳王濞、楚王戊、趙王遂、膠西王卬、濟南王辟光、菑川王賢、膠東王雄渠反，發兵西鄉。

translations.literal: Wu King Bi, Chu King Wu, Zhao King Sui, Jiaoxi King Ang, Jinan King Pi Guang, Zichuan King Xian, Jiaodong King Xiong Qu rebelled, raised troops heading west.
translations.idiomatic: King Bi of Wu, King Wu of Chu, King Sui of Zhao, King Ang of Jiaoxi, King Pi Guang of Jinan, King Xian of Zichuan, King Xiong Qu of Jiaodong rebelled, dispatched troops westward.

sentences.zh: 天子為誅晁錯，遣袁盎諭告，不止，遂西圍梁。

translations.literal: The emperor executed Chao Cuo, sent Yuan Ang to explain and warn, they did not stop, then surrounded Liang in the west.
translations.idiomatic: The emperor sent General Wei Qing and General Li Xi to attack them.

sentences.zh: 上乃遣大將軍竇嬰、太尉周亞夫將兵誅之。

translations.literal: The emperor then sent Grand General Dou Ying, Grand Commandant Zhou Yaofu to lead troops to execute them.
translations.idiomatic: In the seventh year, winter, the Huns invaded the border.

translations.literal: Sixth month on the day Binghai.
translations.idiomatic: Sixth month, on the day Yihai.

sentences.zh: 赦亡軍及楚元王子藝等與謀反者。

translations.literal: Pardoned the fleeing army and Chu Yuan King's son Yi and others who conspired in rebellion.
translations.idiomatic: In the seventh month, on the day Guiyou, the emperor personally ascended the throne to receive the jade seal.

sentences.zh: 封大將軍竇嬰為魏其侯。

translations.literal: Enfeoffed Grand General Dou Ying as Marquis of Weiqi.
translations.idiomatic: He enfeoffed General-in-Chief Dou Ying as Marquis of Weiqi.

sentences.zh: 立楚元王子平陸侯禮為楚王。

translations.literal: Established Chu Yuan King's son Pinglu Marquis Li as Chu King.
translations.idiomatic: He pardoned the fugitive armies and the sons of King Yuan of Chu and others who had conspired in rebellion.

sentences.zh: 立皇子端為膠西王，子勝為中山王。

translations.literal: Established imperial son Duan as Jiaoxi King, son Sheng as Zhongshan King.
translations.idiomatic: In the ninth year, the edict said: "I heard that in ancient times there were officials who collected poems to observe customs, know gains and losses."

sentences.zh: 徙濟北王志為菑川王，淮陽王餘為魯王，汝南王非為江都王。

translations.literal: Moved Jibei King Zhi to be Zichuan King, Huaiyang King Yu to be Lu King, Runan King Fei to be Jiangdu King.
translations.idiomatic: "Now I personally performed the suburban sacrifices to pray for blessings and protection, but the hundred officials have not yet matched expectations. Its discussed what would match my intentions."

translations.literal: Qi King Jiang Lu, Yan King Jia both died.
translations.idiomatic: King Jiang Lu of Qi and King Jia of Yan both died.

translations.literal: Third year first month on the day Bingji, pardon the world. Long star appeared in the west. Heavenly fire burned Luoyang's eastern palace great hall and city rooms. Wu King Bi, Chu King Wu, Zhao King Sui, Jiaoxi King Ang, Jinan King Pi Guang, Zichuan King Xian, Jiaodong King Xiong Qu rebelled, raised troops heading west. The emperor executed Chao Cuo, sent Yuan Ang to explain and warn, they did not stop, then surrounded Liang in the west. The emperor then sent Grand General Dou Ying, Grand Commandant Zhou Yaofu to lead troops to execute them. Sixth month on the day Binghai. Pardoned the fleeing army and Chu Yuan King's son Yi and others who conspired in rebellion. Enfeoffed Grand General Dou Ying as Marquis of Weiqi. Established Chu Yuan King's son Pinglu Marquis Li as Chu King. Established imperial son Duan as Jiaoxi King, son Sheng as Zhongshan King. Moved Jibei King Zhi to be Zichuan King, Huaiyang King Yu to be Lu King, Runan King Fei to be Jiangdu King. Qi King Jiang Lu, Yan King Jia both died.
Fourth year summer, established the crown prince.
translations.idiomatic: Fourth year, summer, he established the crown prince.

translations.literal: Established imperial son Che as Jiaodong King.
translations.idiomatic: He established the imperial son Che as King of Jiaodong.

translations.literal: Sixth month on the day Jiaxu, pardon the world.
translations.idiomatic: Sixth month, on the day Jiaxu, he pardoned the empire.

sentences.zh: 後九月，更以（弋）［易］陽為陽陵。

translations.literal: After nine months, changed Yiyang to Yangling.
translations.idiomatic: He established the imperial son Duan as King of Jiaoxi, son Sheng as King of Zhongshan.

translations.literal: Again established ferry passes, use passes to enter and exit.
translations.idiomatic: He restored the establishment of ferry passes, using tallies for entry and exit.

translations.literal: Winter, made Zhao kingdom into Handan commandery.
translations.idiomatic: Winter, he made Zhao into Handan commandery.

translations.literal: Fourth year summer, established the crown prince. Established imperial son Che as Jiaodong King. Sixth month on the day Jiaxu, pardon the world. After nine months, changed Yiyang to Yangling. Again established ferry passes, use passes to enter and exit. Winter, made Zhao kingdom into Handan commandery.
Fifth year third month, built Yangling and Wei Bridge.
translations.idiomatic: Fifth year, third month, he built Yangling and Wei Bridge.

sentences.zh: 五月，募徙陽陵，予錢二十萬。

translations.literal: Fifth month, recruited migrants to Yangling, gave money twenty thousand.
translations.idiomatic: He moved the King of Guangchuan to be King of Zhao.

sentences.zh: 江都大暴風從西方來，壞城十二丈。

translations.literal: Jiangdu great storm wind came from the west, destroyed city walls twelve zhang.
translations.idiomatic: Sixth year, spring, he enfeoffed Central Commandant Zhao Wan as Marquis of Jianling, Jiangdu Chancellor Jia as Marquis of Jianping, Longxi Grand Administrator Hunye as Marquis of Pingqu, Zhao Chancellor Jia as Marquis of Jiangling, former General Bu as Marquis of Yu.

sentences.zh: 丁卯，封長公主子蟜為隆慮侯。

translations.literal: On the day Dingmao, enfeoff eldest princess's son Dang as Marquis of Longlu.
translations.idiomatic: Autumn, the Xiongnu invaded the border.

translations.literal: Moved Guangchuan King to be Zhao King.
translations.idiomatic: He moved the King of Guangchuan to be King of Zhao.

translations.literal: Fifth year third month, built Yangling and Wei Bridge. Fifth month, recruited migrants to Yangling, gave money twenty thousand. Jiangdu great storm wind came from the west, destroyed city walls twelve zhang. On the day Dingmao, enfeoff eldest princess's son Dang as Marquis of Longlu. Moved Guangchuan King to be Zhao King.

sentences.zh: 六年春，封中尉（趙）綰為建陵侯，江都丞相嘉為建平侯，隴西太守渾邪為平曲侯，趙丞相嘉為江陵侯，故將軍布為鄃侯。

translations.literal: Sixth year spring, enfeoff Central Commandant Zhao Wan as Marquis of Jianling, Jiangdu Chancellor Jia as Marquis of Jianping, Longxi Governor Hun Ye as Marquis of Pingqu, Zhao Chancellor Jia as Marquis of Jiangling, former General Bu as Marquis of Ju.
translations.idiomatic: "Now I personally performed the suburban sacrifices to pray for blessings and protection, but the hundred officials have not yet matched expectations. Its discussed what would match my intentions."

translations.literal: Liang and Chu two kings both died.
translations.idiomatic: The two kings of Liang and Chu both died.

sentences.zh: 後九月，伐馳道樹，殖蘭池。

translations.literal: After nine months, cut down the galloping road trees, planted the orchid pond.
translations.idiomatic: "Now I personally performed the suburban sacrifices to pray for blessings and protection, but the hundred officials have not yet matched expectations. Its discussed what would match my intentions."

translations.literal: Sixth year spring, enfeoff Central Commandant Zhao Wan as Marquis of Jianling, Jiangdu Chancellor Jia as Marquis of Jianping, Longxi Governor Hun Ye as Marquis of Pingqu, Zhao Chancellor Jia as Marquis of Jiangling, former General Bu as Marquis of Ju. Liang and Chu two kings both died. After nine months, cut down the galloping road trees, planted the orchid pond.

sentences.zh: 七年冬，廢栗太子為臨江王。

translations.literal: Seventh year winter, deposed Crown Prince Li as Linjiang King.
translations.idiomatic: Sixth month, the edict said: "I heard that in ancient times there were officials who collected poems to observe customs, know gains and losses."

translations.literal: Eleventh month last day, eclipse of the sun.
translations.idiomatic: "Now I personally performed the suburban sacrifices to pray for blessings and protection, but the hundred officials have not yet matched expectations. Its discussed what would match my intentions."

translations.literal: Spring, released those serving as convicts working at Yangling.
translations.idiomatic: Spring, he exempted convicts and bondservants working on Yangling.

translations.literal: Chancellor Qing resigned.
translations.idiomatic: Chancellor Qing was dismissed.

sentences.zh: 二月乙巳，以太尉條侯周亞夫為丞相。

translations.literal: Second month on the day Biji, appointed Grand Commandant Marquis Tiao Zhou Yaofu as chancellor.
translations.idiomatic: "Now I personally performed the suburban sacrifices to pray for blessings and protection, but the hundred officials have not yet matched expectations. Its discussed what would match my intentions."

sentences.zh: 四月乙巳，立膠東王太后為皇后。

translations.literal: Fourth month on the day Biji, established Jiaodong King's mother as empress.
translations.idiomatic: Seventh month, on the day Guiyou, the emperor personally ascended the throne to receive the jade seal.

translations.literal: On the day Dingsi, established Jiaodong King as crown prince.
translations.idiomatic: On the day Dingsi, he established the King of Jiaodong as crown prince.

translations.literal: Named Che.
translations.idiomatic: His name was Che.

translations.literal: Seventh year winter, deposed Crown Prince Li as Linjiang King. Eleventh month last day, eclipse of the sun. Spring, released those serving as convicts working at Yangling. Chancellor Qing resigned. Second month on the day Biji, appointed Grand Commandant Marquis Tiao Zhou Yaofu as chancellor. Fourth month on the day Biji, established Jiaodong King's mother as empress. On the day Dingsi, established Jiaodong King as crown prince. Named Che.

sentences.zh: 中元年，封故御史大夫周苛孫平為繩侯，故御史大夫周昌（子）［孫］左車為安陽侯，四月乙巳，赦天下，賜爵一級。

translations.literal: Middle first year, enfeoffed former Imperial Secretary Zhou Ke's grandson Ping as Marquis of Sheng, former Imperial Secretary Zhou Chang's grandson Zuo Che as Marquis of Anyang, fourth month on the day Biji, pardon the world, grant nobility one level.
translations.idiomatic: "Now I personally performed the suburban sacrifices to pray for blessings and protection, but the hundred officials have not yet matched expectations. Its discussed what would match my intentions."

translations.literal: Abolished prohibitions and restrictions.
translations.idiomatic: He removed the prohibitions and restrictions.

translations.literal: Earthquake.
translations.idiomatic: There was an earthquake.

sentences.zh: 衡山、原都雨雹，大者尺八寸。

translations.literal: Hengshan, Yuandu hail fell, large ones one chi eight inches.
translations.idiomatic: Spring, first month, the edict said: "I heard that in ancient times there were officials who collected poems to observe customs, know gains and losses."

translations.literal: Middle first year, enfeoffed former Imperial Secretary Zhou Ke's grandson Ping as Marquis of Sheng, former Imperial Secretary Zhou Chang's grandson Zuo Che as Marquis of Anyang, fourth month on the day Biji, pardon the world, grant nobility one level. Abolished prohibitions and restrictions. Earthquake. Hengshan, Yuandu hail fell, large ones one chi eight inches.

sentences.zh: 中二年二月，匈奴入燕，遂不和親。

translations.literal: Middle second year second month, Xiongnu entered Yan, then did not make peace treaty.
translations.idiomatic: "Now I personally performed the suburban sacrifices to pray for blessings and protection, but the hundred officials have not yet matched expectations. Its discussed what would match my intentions."

translations.literal: Third month, summoned Linjiang King to come.
translations.idiomatic: Third month, he summoned the King of Linjiang to come.

translations.literal: He died in the Central Commandant's office.
translations.idiomatic: He immediately died in the Commandant of the Guards' office.

sentences.zh: 夏，立皇子越為廣川王，子寄為膠東王。

translations.literal: Summer, established imperial son Yue as Guangchuan King, son Ji as Jiaodong King.
translations.idiomatic: Third month, the edict said: "I heard that in ancient times there were officials who collected poems to observe customs, know gains and losses."

translations.literal: Enfeoffed four marquises.
translations.idiomatic: He enfeoffed four marquises.

translations.literal: Ninth month on the day Jiaxu, eclipse of the sun.
translations.idiomatic: Ninth month, on the day Jiaxu, there was a solar eclipse.

translations.literal: Middle second year second month, Xiongnu entered Yan, then did not make peace treaty. Third month, summoned Linjiang King to come. He died in the Central Commandant's office. Summer, established imperial son Yue as Guangchuan King, son Ji as Jiaodong King. Enfeoffed four marquises. Ninth month on the day Jiaxu, eclipse of the sun.

sentences.zh: 中三年冬，罷諸侯御史中丞。

translations.literal: Middle third year winter, abolished the feudal lords' imperial secretaries.
translations.idiomatic: "Now I personally performed the suburban sacrifices to pray for blessings and protection, but the hundred officials have not yet matched expectations. Its discussed what would match my intentions."

sentences.zh: 春，匈奴王二人率其徒來降，皆封為列侯。

translations.literal: Spring, two Xiongnu kings led their followers to surrender, all enfeoffed as marquises.
translations.idiomatic: Fifth month, the edict said: "I heard that in ancient times there were officials who collected poems to observe customs, know gains and losses."

translations.literal: Middle third year winter, abolished the feudal lords' imperial secretaries. Spring, two Xiongnu kings led their followers to surrender, all enfeoffed as marquises.
Middle fourth year third month, established Deyang Palace.
translations.idiomatic: Middle fourth year, third month, he established Deyang Palace.

translations.literal: Great locusts.
translations.idiomatic: There was a great locust plague.

translations.literal: Autumn, pardoned convicts working at Yangling.
translations.idiomatic: Autumn, he pardoned convicts working on Yangling.

translations.literal: Middle fourth year third month, established Deyang Palace. Great locusts. Autumn, pardoned convicts working at Yangling.

sentences.zh: 中五年夏，立皇子舜為常山王。

translations.literal: Middle fifth year summer, established imperial son Shun as Changshan King.
translations.idiomatic: Sixth year, spring, he enfeoffed Central Commandant Zhao Wan as Marquis of Jianling, Jiangdu Chancellor Jia as Marquis of Jianping, Longxi Grand Administrator Hunye as Marquis of Pingqu, Zhao Chancellor Jia as Marquis of Jiangling, former General Bu as Marquis of Yu.

translations.literal: Enfeoffed ten marquises.
translations.idiomatic: Autumn, the Xiongnu invaded the border.

sentences.zh: 六月丁巳，赦天下，賜爵一級。

translations.literal: Sixth month on the day Dingji, pardon the world, grant nobility one level.
translations.idiomatic: Fourth month, the edict said: "I heard that in ancient times there were officials who collected poems to observe customs, know gains and losses."

translations.literal: World great floods.
translations.idiomatic: The empire suffered great flooding.

translations.literal: Changed the name of feudal lords' chancellors to 'chancellor'.
translations.idiomatic: He changed the name of the feudal lords' chancellors to "chancellors".

translations.literal: Autumn, earthquake.
translations.idiomatic: Autumn, there was an earthquake.

translations.literal: Middle fifth year summer, established imperial son Shun as Changshan King. Enfeoffed ten marquises. Sixth month on the day Dingji, pardon the world, grant nobility one level. World great floods. Changed the name of feudal lords' chancellors to 'chancellor'. Autumn, earthquake.

sentences.zh: 中六年二月己卯，行幸雍，郊見五帝。

translations.literal: Middle sixth year second month on the day Jimao, traveled to Yong, offered sacrifices seeing the five emperors.
translations.idiomatic: Sixth month, the edict said: "I heard that in ancient times there were officials who collected poems to observe customs, know gains and losses."

translations.literal: Third month, hail fell.
translations.idiomatic: Third month, there was hail.

sentences.zh: 四月，梁孝王、城陽共王、汝南王皆薨。

translations.literal: Fourth month, Liang Xiaowang, Chengyang Gongwang, Runan Wang all died.
translations.idiomatic: Seventh month, the edict said: "I heard that in ancient times there were officials who collected poems to observe customs, know gains and losses."

sentences.zh: 立梁孝王子明為濟川王，子彭離為濟東王，子定為山陽王，子不識為濟陰王。

translations.literal: Established Liang Xiaowang's son Ming as Jichuan King, son Peng Li as Jidong King, son Ding as Shanyang King, son Bu Shi as Ji Yin King.
translations.idiomatic: "Now I personally performed the suburban sacrifices to pray for blessings and protection, but the hundred officials have not yet matched expectations. Its discussed what would match my intentions."

translations.literal: Liang divided into five.
translations.idiomatic: Liang was divided into five.

translations.literal: Enfeoffed four marquises.
translations.idiomatic: He enfeoffed four marquises.

sentences.zh: 更命廷尉為大理，將作少府為將作大匠，主爵中尉為都尉，長信詹事為長信少府，將行為大長秋，大行為行人，奉常為太常，典客為大行，治粟內史為大農。

translations.literal: Changed name of Court Judge to Grand Judge, Construction Foreman to Construction Grand Artisan, Chief of Nobility Commandant to Chief Commandant, Longxin Supervisor of Household to Longxin Junior Steward, Director of the Imperial Household to Grand Chamberlain of the Imperial Household, Grand Usher to Usher, Reverent Constant to Grand Constant, Protocol Secretary to Grand Protocol, Grain Intendant to Grand Farmer.
translations.idiomatic: Ninth month, the edict said: "I heard that in ancient times there were officials who collected poems to observe customs, know gains and losses."

sentences.zh: 以大內為二千石，置左右內官，屬大內。

translations.literal: Made the Grand Interior two thousand shi, established left and right interior officials, belonging to the Grand Interior.
translations.idiomatic: "Now I personally performed the suburban sacrifices to pray for blessings and protection, but the hundred officials have not yet matched expectations. Its discussed what would match my intentions."

translations.idiomatic: Seventh month, on the day Xinhai, there was a solar eclipse.

translations.literal: Eighth month, Xiongnu entered Shangjun.
translations.idiomatic: Eighth month, the Xiongnu invaded Shang commandery.

sentences.zh: 後元年冬，更命中大夫令為衛尉。

translations.literal: Later first year winter, changed name of central palace guard commander to Guard Commander.
translations.idiomatic: Spring, first month, the edict said: "I heard that in ancient times there were officials who collected poems to observe customs, know gains and losses."

sentences.zh: 三月丁酉，赦天下，賜爵一級，中二千石、諸侯相爵右庶長。

translations.literal: Third month on the day Dingyou, pardon the world, grant nobility one level, central two thousand shi, feudal lords' chancellors nobility right grandee.
translations.idiomatic: "Now I personally performed the suburban sacrifices to pray for blessings and protection, but the hundred officials have not yet matched expectations. Its discussed what would match my intentions."

translations.literal: Fourth month, great feast.
translations.idiomatic: Fourth month, there was a great feast.

sentences.zh: 五月丙戌，地動，其蚤食時復動。

translations.literal: Fifth month on the day Bingxu, earthquake, at the time of early meal again shook.
translations.idiomatic: "Now I personally performed the suburban sacrifices to pray for blessings and protection, but the hundred officials have not yet matched expectations. Its discussed what would match my intentions."

sentences.zh: 上庸地動二十二日，壞城垣。

translations.literal: Shangyong earthquake twenty-two days, destroyed city walls.
translations.idiomatic: Third month, the edict said: "I heard that in ancient times there were officials who collected poems to observe customs, know gains and losses."

translations.literal: Seventh month on the day Yiji, eclipse of the sun.
translations.idiomatic: Seventh month, on the day Yisi, there was a solar eclipse.

translations.literal: Chancellor Liu She resigned.
translations.idiomatic: Chancellor Liu She was dismissed.

sentences.zh: 八月壬辰，以御史大夫綰為丞相，封建陵侯。

translations.literal: Eighth month on the day Renchen, appointed Imperial Secretary Wan as chancellor, enfeoffed as Marquis of Jianling.
translations.idiomatic: "Now I personally performed the suburban sacrifices to pray for blessings and protection, but the hundred officials have not yet matched expectations. Its discussed what would match my intentions."

translations.literal: Later first year winter, changed name of central palace guard commander to Guard Commander. Third month on the day Dingyou, pardon the world, grant nobility one level, central two thousand shi, feudal lords' chancellors nobility right grandee. Fourth month, great feast. Fifth month on the day Bingxu, earthquake, at the time of early meal again shook. Shangyong earthquake twenty-two days, destroyed city walls. Seventh month on the day Yiji, eclipse of the sun. Chancellor Liu She resigned. Eighth month on the day Renchen, appointed Imperial Secretary Wan as chancellor, enfeoffed as Marquis of Jianling.

sentences.zh: 後二年正月，地一日三動。

translations.literal: Later second year first month, earth shook three times in one day.
translations.idiomatic: After two years, first month, the earth shook three times in one day.

translations.literal: General Zhi attacked the Xiongnu.
translations.idiomatic: General Zhi attacked the Xiongnu.

translations.literal: Feast five days.
translations.idiomatic: There was feasting for five days.

sentences.zh: 令內史郡不得食馬粟，沒入縣官。

translations.literal: Ordered interior commanderies not to feed horses grain, confiscate to county officials.
translations.idiomatic: "Now I personally performed the suburban sacrifices to pray for blessings and protection, but the hundred officials have not yet matched expectations. Its discussed what would match my intentions."

translations.literal: Ordered convicts to wear seven-span cloth.
translations.idiomatic: He ordered convicts and bondservants to wear seven-span cloth.

translations.literal: Stopped horse pounding.
translations.idiomatic: He stopped having horses tread grain.

sentences.zh: 為歲不登，禁天下食不造歲。

translations.literal: Because the year harvest was poor, prohibited the world from eating unfashionable food.
translations.idiomatic: Eighth month, the edict said: "I heard that in ancient times there were officials who collected poems to observe customs, know gains and losses."

translations.literal: Reduced the marquises sent to their fiefs.
translations.idiomatic: He reduced the number of marquises and sent them back to their states.

translations.literal: Third month, Xiongnu entered Yanmen.
translations.idiomatic: Third month, the Xiongnu invaded Yanmen.

translations.literal: Tenth month, rented Changling fields.
translations.idiomatic: Tenth month, he taxed Changling fields.

translations.literal: Great drought.
translations.idiomatic: There was a great drought.

sentences.zh: 衡山國、河東、雲中郡民疫。

translations.literal: Hengshan kingdom, Hedong, Yunzhong commandery people epidemic.
translations.idiomatic: Autumn, the Xiongnu invaded the border.

translations.literal: Later second year first month, earth shook three times in one day. General Zhi attacked the Xiongnu. Feast five days. Ordered interior commanderies not to feed horses grain, confiscate to county officials. Ordered convicts to wear seven-span cloth. Stopped horse pounding. Because the year harvest was poor, prohibited the world from eating unfashionable food. Reduced the marquises sent to their fiefs. Third month, Xiongnu entered Yanmen. Tenth month, rented Changling fields. Great drought. Hengshan kingdom, Hedong, Yunzhong commandery people epidemic.

sentences.zh: 後三年十月，日月皆（食）赤五日。

translations.literal: Later third year tenth month, sun and moon both appeared red five days.
translations.idiomatic: Fourth month, the edict said: "I heard that in ancient times there were officials who collected poems to observe customs, know gains and losses."

translations.literal: Twelfth month last day, thunder.
translations.idiomatic: Twelfth month, last day, there was thunder.

translations.literal: Sun appeared purple.
translations.idiomatic: The sun appeared purple.

translations.literal: Five stars moved retrograde guarding Taiwei.
translations.idiomatic: The five planets moved retrograde guarding Taiwei.

translations.literal: Moon passed through the heavenly court center.
translations.idiomatic: The moon passed through the center of the Heavenly Court.

translations.literal: First month on the day Jiazi, crown prince capped.
translations.idiomatic: First month, on the day Jia Yin, the crown prince came of age.

translations.literal: On the day Jiazi, Emperor Jing died.
translations.idiomatic: On the day Jiazi, Emperor Jing passed away.

sentences.zh: 遺詔賜諸侯王以下至民為父後爵一級，天下戶百錢。

translations.literal: Testament granted feudal lords and kings below to people who become heirs nobility one level, world households one hundred cash.
translations.idiomatic: "Now I personally performed the suburban sacrifices to pray for blessings and protection, but the hundred officials have not yet matched expectations. Its discussed what would match my intentions."

sentences.zh: 出宮人歸其家，復無所與。

translations.literal: Sent out palace people to return to their homes, pardoned without giving anything.
translations.idiomatic: He sent palace women back to their homes, and again gave them no assignments.

sentences.zh: 太子即位，是為孝武皇帝。

translations.literal: Crown prince ascended the throne, this was Emperor Wu.
translations.idiomatic: The crown prince ascended the throne, this was Emperor Wu.

sentences.zh: 三月，封皇太后弟蚡為武安侯，弟勝為周陽侯。

translations.literal: Third month, enfeoffed Empress Dowager's younger brother Fen as Marquis of Wuan, younger brother Sheng as Marquis of Zhouyang.
translations.idiomatic: Ninth month, the edict said: "I heard that in ancient times there were officials who collected poems to observe customs, know gains and losses."

translations.literal: Established Yangling.
translations.idiomatic: He established Yangling.

translations.literal: Later third year tenth month, sun and moon both appeared red five days. Twelfth month last day, thunder. Sun appeared purple. Five stars moved retrograde guarding Taiwei. Moon passed through the heavenly court center. First month on the day Jiazi, crown prince capped. On the day Jiazi, Emperor Jing died. Testament granted feudal lords and kings below to people who become heirs nobility one level, world households one hundred cash. Sent out palace people to return to their homes, pardoned without giving anything. Crown prince ascended the throne, this was Emperor Wu. Third month, enfeoffed Empress Dowager's younger brother Fen as Marquis of Wuan, younger brother Sheng as Marquis of Zhouyang. Established Yangling.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：漢興，孝文施大德，天下懷安，至孝景，不復憂異姓，而晁錯刻削諸侯，遂使七國俱起，合從而西鄉，以諸侯太盛，而錯為之不以漸也。

translations.literal: The Grand Historian says: Han arose, Emperor Wen applied great virtue, the world felt peaceful, to Emperor Jing, no longer worried about different surnames, yet Chao Cuo cut and reduced the feudal lords, thus caused seven kingdoms to rise together, allied and headed west, because the feudal lords were too powerful, and Cuo did it not gradually.
translations.idiomatic: Sixth year, spring, he enfeoffed Central Commandant Zhao Wan as Marquis of Jianling, Jiangdu Chancellor Jia as Marquis of Jianping, Longxi Grand Administrator Hunye as Marquis of Pingqu, Zhao Chancellor Jia as Marquis of Jiangling, former General Bu as Marquis of Yu.

sentences.zh: 及主父偃言之，而諸侯以弱，卒以安。

translations.literal: When Zhu Fu Yan spoke of it, the feudal lords weakened, finally became peaceful.
translations.idiomatic: Autumn, the Xiongnu invaded the border.

translations.literal: The mechanism of safety and danger, how can it not be due to planning?
translations.idiomatic: The mechanism of safety and danger, is it not through planning?

translations.literal: The Grand Historian says: Han arose, Emperor Wen applied great virtue, the world felt peaceful, to Emperor Jing, no longer worried about different surnames, yet Chao Cuo cut and reduced the feudal lords, thus caused seven kingdoms to rise together, allied and headed west, because the feudal lords were too powerful, and Cuo did it not gradually. When Zhu Fu Yan spoke of it, the feudal lords weakened, finally became peaceful. The mechanism of safety and danger, how can it not be due to planning?
